text: Francis Anthony Quinn (September 11, 1921 â€“ March 21, 2019) was an American Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1946. He served as the Bishop of the Diocese of Sacramento, California from 1980 to 1993. He was born in Los Angeles, California. Quinn died on March 21, 2019, at the age of 97. At the time of his death, he was the oldest living bishop in the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * Francis Quinn at Catholic-Hierarchy.org Category:1921 births Category:2019 deaths Category:People from Los Angeles Category:American Roman Catholic bishops
title: Francis Quinn
